name: windDirection_setValue
description: This function is used to adjust the wind direction on SmartThings devices like fans and air conditioners.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the wind direction.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to set for the wind direction (e.g., fixed, up, down, left, right).

parameters.name: windAngle
parameters.description: The angle at which to set the wind direction.
